statements: SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name FROM Patients;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE date_of_birth < '2000-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Female' AND date_of_birth > '1990-01-01';
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM Patients WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1980-01-01' AND '1990-01-01';
SELECT first_name, last_name, contact_number FROM Patients WHERE address LIKE '%Avenue%';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_patients FROM Patients;
SELECT AVG(patient_id) AS avg_patient_id FROM Patients;
SELECT MAX(date_of_birth) AS oldest_patient_dob FROM Patients;
SELECT MIN(date_of_birth) AS youngest_patient_dob FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name FROM Patients ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM Patients ORDER BY first_name ASC, last_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_patients FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT DISTINCT gender FROM Patients;
SELECT first_name, last_name, EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date_of_birth) AS birth_year FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name, date_of_birth, gender, address, contact_number FROM Patients;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT first_name, last_name, address FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name FROM Patients WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Female' AND address LIKE '%New York%';
SELECT first_name, last_name, date_of_birth, contact_number FROM Patients WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1980-01-01' AND '1990-12-31';
SELECT first_name, last_name, contact_number FROM Patients WHERE first_name LIKE 'A%' AND last_name LIKE 'B%';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_patients FROM Patients;
SELECT gender, COUNT(*) AS total FROM Patients GROUP BY gender;
SELECT gender, AVG(DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), date_of_birth)) AS avg_age FROM Patients GROUP BY gender;
SELECT date_of_birth, COUNT(*) AS total FROM Patients GROUP BY date_of_birth HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT address, COUNT(*) AS total_patients FROM Patients GROUP BY address ORDER BY total_patients DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, contact_number FROM Patients ORDER BY last_name, first_name;
SELECT * FROM Patients LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE patient_id IN (1, 3, 5, 7, 9);
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE contact_number IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' OR address LIKE '%Avenue%';
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE date_of_birth > '1990-01-01' ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name, DATE_FORMAT(date_of_birth, '%Y-%m-%d') AS formatted_dob FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_id, CONCAT(first_name, ' ', last_name) AS full_name FROM Patients;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, gender FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM MedicalRecords;
SELECT doctor_name, diagnosis FROM MedicalRecords WHERE doctor_name = 'Dr. Smith';
SELECT patient_name, address FROM Patients WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE date_of_birth >= '1990-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Patients;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MedicalRecords WHERE diagnosis = 'Hypertension';
SELECT DISTINCT gender FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_created FROM MedicalRecords ORDER BY date_created DESC;
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male' AND address LIKE '%Avenue%';
SELECT patient_id, doctor_name FROM MedicalRecords WHERE record_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
SELECT * FROM Patients INNER JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id;
SELECT MAX(date_created) FROM MedicalRecords;
SELECT AVG(date_created) FROM MedicalRecords;
SELECT patient_name, address AS location FROM Patients;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT gender) FROM Patients;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Other' OR gender = 'Prefer not to say';
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, gender FROM Patients WHERE date_of_birth >= '1990-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, address FROM Patients WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT * FROM MedicalRecords WHERE doctor_name = 'Dr. Smith';
SELECT record_id, diagnosis, prescription, date_created FROM MedicalRecords WHERE date_created BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT Patients.patient_name, MedicalRecords.doctor_name FROM Patients JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_patients FROM Patients;
SELECT AVG(date_of_birth) AS avg_dob FROM Patients;
SELECT MAX(date_created) AS latest_record FROM MedicalRecords;
SELECT MIN(date_created) AS oldest_record FROM MedicalRecords;
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(*) AS num_records FROM MedicalRecords GROUP BY patient_id;
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(*) AS num_records FROM MedicalRecords GROUP BY patient_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT doctor_name, COUNT(*) AS num_records FROM MedicalRecords GROUP BY doctor_name ORDER BY num_records DESC;
SELECT patient_name, COUNT(*) AS num_records FROM Patients LEFT JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id GROUP BY Patients.patient_id;
SELECT patient_name, MAX(date_created) AS latest_record FROM Patients LEFT JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id GROUP BY Patients.patient_id;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, prescription, date_created FROM Patients JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id WHERE Patients.gender = 'Female';
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, prescription, date_created FROM Patients JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id WHERE Patients.date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, prescription, date_created FROM Patients JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id WHERE MedicalRecords.diagnosis LIKE '%flu%';
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, prescription, date_created FROM Patients JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id WHERE date_of_birth < '1980-01-01' AND gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT first_name, last_name, dob FROM patients;
SELECT patient_id, address FROM patients;
SELECT first_name, last_name, dob, address FROM patients WHERE dob > '2000-01-01';
SELECT * FROM medical_records;
SELECT patient_id, doctor, diagnosis FROM medical_records;
SELECT record_id, patient_id, doctor, diagnosis, prescription FROM medical_records WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%flu%';
SELECT * FROM appointments;
SELECT patient_id, doctor, appointment_date FROM appointments;
SELECT appointment_id, patient_id, doctor, appointment_date, reason FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT first_name, last_name, appointment_date, reason FROM patients p JOIN appointments a ON p.patient_id = a.patient_id;
SELECT p.patient_id, p.first_name, m.diagnosis, m.prescription FROM patients p JOIN medical_records m ON p.patient_id = m.patient_id;
SELECT p.first_name, m.doctor, a.appointment_date, a.reason FROM patients p JOIN medical_records m ON p.patient_id = m.patient_id JOIN appointments a ON p.patient_id = a.patient_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS patients_count FROM patients;
SELECT AVG(patient_id) AS avg_patient_id, MIN(patient_id) AS min_patient_id, MAX(patient_id) AS max_patient_id FROM patients;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS records_count FROM medical_records;
SELECT AVG(record_id) AS avg_record_id, MIN(record_id) AS min_record_id, MAX(record_id) AS max_record_id FROM medical_records;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS appointments_count FROM appointments;
SELECT AVG(appointment_id) AS avg_appointment_id, MIN(appointment_id) AS min_appointment_id, MAX(appointment_id) AS max_appointment_id FROM appointments;
SELECT first_name, last_name, dob FROM patients WHERE dob BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '2000-01-01';
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT first_name, last_name, address FROM patients;
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name, dob FROM patients WHERE dob > '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM medical_records WHERE doctor='Dr. Smith';
SELECT patient_id, doctor, diagnosis FROM medical_records WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%flu%';
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM patients INNER JOIN medical_records ON patients.patient_id = medical_records.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM patients LEFT JOIN medical_records ON patients.patient_id = medical_records.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM patients RIGHT JOIN medical_records ON patients.patient_id = medical_records.patient_id;
SELECT first_name, last_name, diagnosis FROM patients INNER JOIN medical_records ON patients.patient_id = medical_records.patient_id;
SELECT first_name, last_name, doctor FROM patients LEFT JOIN medical_records ON patients.patient_id = medical_records.patient_id WHERE doctor='Dr. Jones';

SELECT first_name, last_name, appointment_date, reason FROM patients RIGHT JOIN appointments ON patients.patient_id = appointments.patient_id WHERE appointment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name, diagnosis, appointment_date FROM patients LEFT JOIN medical_records ON patients.patient_id = medical_records.patient_id LEFT JOIN appointments ON patients.patient_id = appointments.patient_id;

SELECT first_name, last_name, diagnosis, appointment_date FROM patients INNER JOIN medical_records ON patients.patient_id = medical_records.patient_id LEFT JOIN appointments ON patients.patient_id = appointments.patient_id WHERE diagnosis='COVID-19';
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name, appointment_date, reason FROM patients RIGHT JOIN appointments ON patients.patient_id = appointments.patient_id WHERE reason='Check-up';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS Total_Patients FROM patients;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS Total_Medical_Records FROM medical_records;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS Total_Appointments FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date >= CURDATE();
SELECT AVG(DATEDIFF(NOW(), dob)) AS Average_Age FROM patients;

SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name, appointment_date, reason, doctor FROM patients LEFT JOIN appointments ON patients.patient_id = appointments.patient_id LEFT JOIN medical_records ON patients.patient_id = medical_records.patient_id WHERE reason='Follow-up' AND doctor='Dr. Patel';
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM Patients WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT * FROM MedicalRecords;
SELECT condition, treatment FROM MedicalRecords WHERE discharge_date IS NULL;
SELECT doctor_name, specialization FROM Doctors;
SELECT doctor_name, contact_number FROM Doctors WHERE specialization='Cardiology';
SELECT appointment_date, appointment_time FROM Appointments;
SELECT patient_name, doctor_name FROM Patients, Doctors, Appointments WHERE Patients.patient_id = Appointments.patient_id AND Doctors.doctor_id = Appointments.doctor_id;
SELECT patient_name, doctor_name, appointment_date FROM Patients, Doctors, Appointments WHERE Patients.patient_id = Appointments.patient_id AND Doctors.doctor_id = Appointments.doctor_id;

SELECT patient_name, doctor_name, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM Patients, Doctors, Appointments WHERE Patients.patient_id = Appointments.patient_id AND Doctors.doctor_id = Appointments.doctor_id;
SELECT Condition, Treatment, Admission_date FROM MedicalRecords WHERE Admission_date <= CURDATE();
SELECT record_id, condition, treatment FROM MedicalRecords WHERE condition='Diabetes';
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '2000-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, contact_number FROM Patients WHERE patient_id IN (SELECT patient_id FROM MedicalRecords WHERE condition='Asthma');
SELECT appointment_date, appointment_time FROM Appointments WHERE appointment_date = CURDATE();
SELECT doctor_name, contact_number FROM Doctors WHERE doctor_id IN (SELECT doctor_id FROM Appointments WHERE appointment_date = CURDATE());
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Patients;
SELECT COUNT(*), gender FROM Patients GROUP BY gender;
SELECT doctor_name, COUNT(*) FROM Doctors, Appointments WHERE Doctors.doctor_id = Appointments.doctor_id GROUP BY doctor_name HAVING COUNT(*) >= 10;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM Patients WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '2000-12-31';
SELECT Patients.patient_name, MedicalRecords.condition FROM Patients JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id WHERE MedicalRecords.admission_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT Doctors.doctor_name, Appointments.appointment_date FROM Doctors JOIN Appointments ON Doctors.doctor_id = Appointments.doctor_id WHERE Doctors.specialization = 'Cardiology';
SELECT DISTINCT Patients.patient_name, MedicalRecords.condition FROM Patients JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id WHERE MedicalRecords.discharge_date IS NULL;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_patients FROM Patients;
SELECT AVG(DATEDIFF(MONTH, Patients.date_of_birth, GETDATE())) AS avg_age_in_months FROM Patients;
SELECT Doctors.specialization, COUNT(*) AS total_doctors FROM Doctors GROUP BY Doctors.specialization;
SELECT doctor_name, contact_number FROM Doctors WHERE doctor_id IN (SELECT doctor_id FROM Appointments WHERE appointment_date = '2022-05-20');
SELECT patient_name, contact_number FROM Patients WHERE patient_id IN (SELECT patient_id FROM Appointments WHERE doctor_id = 101);
SELECT DISTINCT Patients.patient_id, Patients.patient_name FROM Patients JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id WHERE MedicalRecords.condition LIKE '%COVID%';

SELECT Doctors.doctor_name, Appointments.appointment_date, Appointments.appointment_time FROM Doctors JOIN Appointments ON Doctors.doctor_id = Appointments.doctor_id WHERE Appointments.appointment_date >= '2022-06-01' AND Appointments.appointment_date <= '2022-06-30';

SELECT Patients.patient_name, MedicalRecords.condition, Appointments.appointment_date FROM Patients JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id JOIN Appointments ON Patients.patient_id = Appointments.patient_id WHERE Appointments.appointment_date = '2022-07-15';

SELECT Doctors.doctor_name, Doctors.specialization, COUNT(*) AS total_appointments FROM Doctors JOIN Appointments ON Doctors.doctor_id = Appointments.doctor_id GROUP BY Doctors.doctor_name, Doctors.specialization;

SELECT DISTINCT Doctors.doctor_name, Patients.patient_name FROM Doctors JOIN Appointments ON Doctors.doctor_id = Appointments.doctor_id JOIN Patients ON Patients.patient_id = Appointments.patient_id WHERE Doctors.specialization = 'Pediatrics';

SELECT patient_name, condition FROM Patients JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id WHERE MedicalRecords.condition LIKE '%Diabetes%' ORDER BY MedicalRecords.admission_date DESC;

SELECT Doctors.doctor_name AS 'Primary Doctor', Doctors.contact_number AS 'Doctor Contact', d.doctor_name AS 'Consulting Doctor', d.contact_number AS 'Consulting Doctor Contact' FROM Doctors JOIN Doctors d ON Doctors.specialization = d.specialization WHERE Doctors.doctor_id = 101;

SELECT Patients.patient_name, MedicalRecords.admission_date, MedicalRecords.discharge_date, DATEDIFF(DAY, MedicalRecords.admission_date, MedicalRecords.discharge_date) AS length_of_stay FROM Patients JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id ORDER BY length_of_stay DESC;
SELECT Doctors.doctor_name, COUNT(*) AS total_appointments FROM Doctors JOIN Appointments ON Doctors.doctor_id = Appointments.doctor_id GROUP BY Doctors.doctor_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 10;
SELECT patient_name, COUNT(*) AS total_appointments FROM Patients JOIN Appointments ON Patients.patient_id = Appointments.patient_id GROUP BY patient_name HAVING COUNT(*) >= 5;

SELECT Patients.patient_name, MedicalRecords.condition, Appointments.appointment_date FROM Patients JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id JOIN Appointments ON Patients.patient_id = Appointments.patient_id WHERE Appointments.appointment_date BETWEEN '2022-08-01' AND '2022-08-31';
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT name, dob FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT diagnosis, treatment FROM MedicalRecords WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT name, specialty FROM Doctors WHERE department = 'Cardiology';
SELECT * FROM Appointments WHERE doctor_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001' AND status = 'Pending';
SELECT name, dosage FROM Medications WHERE name = 'MedicineA';
SELECT name, appointment_date FROM Appointments WHERE status = 'Confirmed';
SELECT * FROM MedicalRecords WHERE treatment LIKE '%Surgery%';
SELECT name, specialty FROM Doctors WHERE specialty IN ('Cardiology', 'Neurology');
SELECT * FROM Medications;
SELECT * FROM Appointments WHERE appointment_date > '2021-10-01';
SELECT name, department FROM Doctors WHERE doctor_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174002';
SELECT * FROM MedicalRecords WHERE diagnosis = 'Hypertension';
SELECT name, dob FROM Patients WHERE dob BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '1999-12-31';
SELECT treatment, doctor_id FROM MedicalRecords WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174003';
SELECT name, appointment_date FROM Appointments WHERE doctor_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174004';
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE email IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM Medications WHERE usage = 'Oral';
SELECT name, specialty FROM Doctors WHERE department = 'Surgery';
SELECT name, dob, gender FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM MedicalRecords WHERE diagnosis = 'COVID-19' AND treatment = 'Quarantine';
SELECT p.name, m.name AS medication_name FROM Patients p JOIN MedicalRecords mr ON p.patient_id = mr.patient_id JOIN Medications m ON m.medication_id = mr.medication_id;
SELECT d.name AS doctor_name, a.appointment_date FROM Appointments a JOIN Doctors d ON a.doctor_id = d.doctor_id WHERE a.status = 'Scheduled';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS appointment_count FROM Appointments WHERE appointment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT d.name AS doctor_name, d.specialty FROM Doctors d JOIN Appointments a ON a.doctor_id = d.doctor_id WHERE a.status = 'Confirmed';

SELECT p.name AS patient_name, m.name AS medication_name FROM Patients p JOIN MedicalRecords mr ON p.patient_id = mr.patient_id JOIN Medications m ON m.medication_id = mr.medication_id WHERE m.dosage = '100mg';
SELECT d.name AS doctor_name, a.appointment_date FROM Appointments a JOIN Doctors d ON a.doctor_id = d.doctor_id WHERE a.status = 'Cancelled';

SELECT p.name AS patient_name, m.name AS medication_name, a.appointment_date FROM Patients p JOIN MedicalRecords mr ON p.patient_id = mr.patient_id JOIN Medications m ON m.medication_id = mr.medication_id JOIN Appointments a ON p.patient_id = a.patient_id WHERE a.appointment_date >= '2022-02-01';

SELECT d.name AS doctor_name, d.specialty, COUNT(a.appointment_id) AS total_appointments FROM Doctors d JOIN Appointments a ON d.doctor_id = a.doctor_id GROUP BY d.name, d.specialty HAVING total_appointments > 10;
SELECT d.name AS doctor_name, COUNT(a.appointment_id) AS total_appointments FROM Doctors d JOIN Appointments a ON d.doctor_id = a.doctor_id GROUP BY d.name HAVING total_appointments < 5;
SELECT p.name AS patient_name, COUNT(a.appointment_id) AS total_appointments FROM Patients p JOIN Appointments a ON p.patient_id = a.patient_id GROUP BY p.name HAVING total_appointments > 3;
SELECT d.name AS doctor_name, AVG(a.appointment_date) AS avg_appointment_date FROM Doctors d JOIN Appointments a ON d.doctor_id = a.doctor_id GROUP BY d.name;
SELECT p.name AS patient_name, AVG(DATE_PART('year', NOW()) - DATE_PART('year', p.dob)) AS avg_age FROM Patients p GROUP BY p.name;
SELECT d.name AS doctor_name, MIN(a.appointment_date) AS first_appointment_date FROM Doctors d JOIN Appointments a ON d.doctor_id = a.doctor_id GROUP BY d.name;
SELECT d.name AS doctor_name, MAX(a.appointment_date) AS last_appointment_date FROM Doctors d JOIN Appointments a ON d.doctor_id = a.doctor_id GROUP BY d.name;

SELECT p.name AS patient_name, COUNT(DISTINCT m.name) AS unique_medications FROM Patients p JOIN MedicalRecords mr ON p.patient_id = mr.patient_id JOIN Medications m ON m.medication_id = mr.medication_id;

SELECT d.specialty, COUNT(DISTINCT p.patient_id) AS unique_patients FROM Doctors d JOIN Appointments a ON d.doctor_id = a.doctor_id JOIN Patients p ON p.patient_id = a.patient_id GROUP BY d.specialty;
SELECT p.dob, COUNT(a.appointment_id) AS total_appointments FROM Patients p JOIN Appointments a ON p.patient_id = a.patient_id GROUP BY p.dob HAVING total_appointments > 2;

SELECT d.specialty, AVG(DATE_PART('year', NOW()) - DATE_PART('year', p.dob)) AS avg_patient_age FROM Doctors d JOIN Appointments a ON d.doctor_id = a.doctor_id JOIN Patients p ON p.patient_id = a.patient_id GROUP BY d.specialty HAVING avg_patient_age > 40;
